website_summaries.verdict: If you need to keep rodents away from several small places, this is a good option.
pros: Safe to use around kids and pets – no noticeable sound
Comes with a built-in night light
Easy to use – just plug in any room where pests are detected
cons: Does not repel insects, only rodents
Takes about a week to work

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS & DOES NOT WORK!!
customer_reviews.text: DANGEROUS and does NOT WORK!! This product does NOT work at all! We purchased and put many places around house (kitchen, dining room, living room). Mice just ran right past... also please be warned: I feel that this product could really be dangerous. An electrical fire began where this item was plugged in. We had no problems with the outlet or our house before. Everyone in our family is safe and all of our belongings are intact bc the electrical surge cut out and fire did not spread. Just to forewarn you before you purchase that it might not be the best choice...good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Either these work or vermin just don't like me.
customer_reviews.text: I got these because mice love to come in from the cold this time of year and they have lousy manners. It's hard to know if these things are effective, but my next door neighbor (in a house built much better than mine) is having a problem right now and is setting traps while I haven't found a single rodent turdlet, let alone encountered a mouse. We both have pet food accessible in the kitchen. I have one of these in each room and the little night lights are OK, too.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Runs out the rodents.
customer_reviews.text: These work great. Plugged them in and sent the mice running away. They abandoned their nests and have not been back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer #1

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: This product did not chase any rodents or mouse away at all. Someone had told me that this product would be good to chase away mice because the sound may bother them. Well it’s been a month now and we had a mouse stuck in our garage that won’t leave. We had to get pest control to put multiple traps instead since and caught the lifeless mice. This product didn’t chase it away. I had it on three different wall plugs in the garage also. So I don’t think it works.
customer_reviews.author: jotika

customer_reviews.title: THEY 100% WORK
customer_reviews.text: WAS A LEGIT SKEPTIC, BUT...my daughter highly recommended trying these, I was catching and releasing 3-4 mice a day all of the sudden. They would actually look directly at me and continue on when I shined my tactical flash light orvideoed them while roaming in my pantry. I WAS FURIOUS so I got these & OVERNIGHT, so far after 2 weeks not one dropping to be seen after totally clearing out pantry, lysoling and applying new shelf liner. Fan for life!
customer_reviews.author: KimberelyDM

customer_reviews.title: Another waste of money
customer_reviews.text: As I found with the larger ultrasonic machines, these simply do not repel mice. I have the same amount of mice (caught on glue traps) as before I started using these.
customer_reviews.author: fc

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!
customer_reviews.text: Actually works! Took 2 weeks to fully encourage my house guests to leave but they left! Safe around dogs, cats and horses. Such a wonderful alternative to poisons and sticky traps.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Neal

customer_reviews.title: No mice this fall
customer_reviews.text: I live in a hundred plus year old house. It's impossible to get it sealed completely against intruders. EVERY fall by about October someone tiny and four-legged moves in. I just hate killing them but have tried lots of things that didn't really work. These work. I put one in the kitchen, one in the living room and one in the main floor bedroom. It's mid-December, we've had an exceptionally chilly fall and early winter here in Minnesota and no visitors. So I put them in the garage at our lake home too, and so far there is no evidence of mice. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for a year and have had no mice problems since. I put them in the garage, utility room and kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: Questionable performance
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to put under the hoods of our vehicles (using extension cords) parked outside to stop rodent damage to the vehicles’ wiring. (I’d repaired 8 12V wires that had been chewed through.) I came out the next day to find one of the repaired wires had been re-chewed through, located 8 inches from the speaker of the repeller. YMMV.
customer_reviews.author: Early Adopter

customer_reviews.title: Keeps mice out but not other rodents
customer_reviews.text: Keeps mice out but not other rodents. We have caught at least three shrews (a rodent that looks like a mouse but slightly longer and skinner and not as cute) since we got these devices. However, it does do an amazing job keeping the mice out so if that’s your issue, this is a recommended product! I’m giving this product a 4 Star because it does its job, just wish it did a little more. Also, a really nice feature is the little light that shines at night! Handy when it comes to sneaking downstairs for a midnight snack ;)
customer_reviews.author: Liana Ilyuk

customer_reviews.title: It's a great nontoxic way keeping ants away in a small bathroom
customer_reviews.text: It's a great nontoxic way keeping ants away in a small bathroom. In the past, we've tried mixing borax in sugar water, ant traps, you name it. Our downstairs powder room was always like an ant super highway for years. It's now ants free! We bought a few more for our other larger bathrooms. Ants are not completely gone, but it's a lot less than before.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: After having 3 mice in our house (which is very ...
customer_reviews.text: After having 3 mice in our house (which is very clean), I decided to try these. Placed 2 in my garage and 1 in my basement. So far, I haven't seen any signs of Mice. So, I'd say they get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrimeAddict

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work okay
customer_reviews.text: We had some issues with rodents scratching in our walls in two specific spots. I really didn’t want to exterminate them, but needed a way to make it obvious they weren’t welcome there. I plugged these in in those areas and it’s been several months - no scratching! I don’t know that they would work well for large areas, but for small specific spots they do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Kyrie Tompkins-Overlock

customer_reviews.title: I can hear it but the mice don't care.
customer_reviews.text: This has done nothing to discourage the mice in my house, they still brazenly run about. Also the noise this makes is audible to me, a not quite high pitched buzzing. The "nightlight" portion of this is also a joke, its one small led bulb that can light up 4 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Kulain

customer_reviews.title: They do their job when used correctly!!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do its job! Kept mice away for over 3 months now! But please people realize if you already have mice that this WONT work. This is to prevent them from getting in your home. If the mouse is in, it wont leave just because of this repeller, it will put up with it as long as it has shelter and has food! So keep all food, even your pets food away, packed and completely sealed!! I have a Miniature Pinscher (a dog) and he isnt bother by these things one bit!! So it deff is dog friendly!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Small, efficient, great nightlight
customer_reviews.text: No mice in my RV as of yet so as far as I’m concerned they’re working. Also I love the tiny nightlights that illuminate enough that I don’t need to turn on any other lights in the night.
customer_reviews.author: Pixie1111

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Working great have not had any little visitors since I got these
customer_reviews.author: Don S.

customer_reviews.title: These rodent repellers by the folks that build a better mouse trap, really work!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried cheaper repellers that do not seem to put out a strong sound, if any. These do and will overload an instrument that's display is limited to 20 KHz. Friends with inexpensive hearing aids, which don't have an ultrasonic filter can hear them click. I have one in every room of our house and have not seen any indication of a mouse having been anywhere since they were installed.
customer_reviews.author: Joel M. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say how well they work as far as rodents go, but I have yet to see one EVER in my house. I love the little light it illuminates on the floor. It is fantastic at night and gives me piece of mind for little critters.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Bonham

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't repel
customer_reviews.text: We already had some traps placed when I plugged these devices in. I put 3 of them down, 1 next to some traps that were set - refer to photo. Disappointingly, a mouse returned to this same trap 3 times, right next to the plugged in device. In the picture above you see the majority of the bait has gone. The next day, the rest had disappeared. Today, a mouse was caught in this trap. Far from repelling, the rodents were happy to come very close to this device, proving to me that it does not do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Miller_C

customer_reviews.title: These are the best additions you can make to keep mice out
customer_reviews.text: These are the best additions you can make to keep mice out. We run cheap extension cords through our basement rafters and hang these, pointed at various ares of possible entry. No more mice problems.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Gofaster

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working, more than a month without a sighting!
customer_reviews.author: m.mare

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT❣️❣️❣️❣️
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure this was going to work but this has proven to be THE BEST purchase I’ve ever made in the pest control arena hands down!!! Been using it for close to a year and not a single rodent, water bug or roach (after getting rid of them from former tenants). I just ordered another set to have on hand! LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They Work!!
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised that these things really work! I also bought them for my sister-in-law and they worked for her immediately! Also, make a nightlight!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda kindle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT DOES NOT WORK AT ALL!!! Mouse problem in a NYC apartment, and the mice are still running around and are not affected at all by these electronic things. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work.
customer_reviews.text: They look nice , and seems to work. We put one in the barn, which is more open and have seen any signs of mice. Have few in the house also seems to clear it out. Now plan on added some to the shop and greenhouse.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: To my surprise, these work!
customer_reviews.text: These little babies actually seem to work! We live in an area with lots of pests. I put 6 of these around the house and we haven't had any issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: coldinflag

customer_reviews.title: No mice, nice night light!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure whether I would have had any mice without these but I bought them when I moved into an older house. No mice ever. Yaaay!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The LED's also provide excellent night lights
customer_reviews.text: I bought a lot and pluged them into almost every socket and the critters left immediately. The LED's also provide excellent night lights.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Nice night lights!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to work. We still have a mouse problem. They do make very nice night lights though, and are very inconspicuous. I would recommend taking additional action and not rely on these alone.
customer_reviews.author: KRBF

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: We live near a river so rats are a nuisance. These little things ran the rats next door, until I told our neighbors about them. So they have found other more hospitable houses than our two. Highly recommended.Nice very low light nightlight too.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Not much deterred.
customer_reviews.text: Minimally effective. Not much has been deterred by these. Better to upgrade if you have a problem
customer_reviews.author: Dana Clearwood

customer_reviews.title: works!!
customer_reviews.text: Installed one on our front porch and no more mouse or rat droppings are present. Also, the skunk and squirrel are no longer regular visitors. I installed three more in our barn.
customer_reviews.author: Tpilcher

customer_reviews.title: These work!!
customer_reviews.text: This product saved us so much time, effort, and energy. Keeps our kitchen free, clean and clear-and mouse alive and well outside where they belong :) love this. It does not bother people. If it isn't working for you, add another to the wall nearest entry and nearest the problem area. It works.
customer_reviews.author: AGriffiths

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like the nightlight that adds security in the hallway. My Dad has used these for years, and he raved about them. They work for me. The small amount of electricity the product uses is not noticeable at all.
customer_reviews.author: peachey

customer_reviews.title: Ultrasonic rodent repellents are safer than poison or traps.
customer_reviews.text: We have used these rodent repellents for several years and prefer them to poison or traps. We have a dog who eats everything and sticks his nose in everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I live in the woods in an old cabin like place and had been fighting mice for weeks
customer_reviews.text: I live in the woods in an old cabin like place and had been fighting mice for weeks. I was very sceptical of these but wow. No more mice at all. Works surprisingly well
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Hasn’t worked for me.
customer_reviews.text: Hasn’t caught a thing yet. I got this about two weeks ago and put two of them out where I had seen the mice. So far nothing. I did buy two of the traditional Victor mouse traps at ace hardware store and have caught two mice in a week. I’m going to give it a little more time
customer_reviews.author: Sirisan

customer_reviews.title: part of the arsenal, but not the whole arsenal
customer_reviews.text: In conjunction with Victors new traps and some rodent spray, I have rid my house of mice.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it dose work really
customer_reviews.text: After installing it haven’t noticed any mice. Then 2 months later Caught another mouse. It’s supposed to repel spider too but it didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny

customer_reviews.title: Been using for over a year and they seem to do the trick
customer_reviews.text: I put them near my back slider door and in my garage. Love these. Seem to work, haven’t had any more issues with mice
customer_reviews.author: Husky Mom

customer_reviews.title: Don't work!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These don't work at all in keeping mice from entering and running around your house.
customer_reviews.author: Jaminb

customer_reviews.title: Magic!
customer_reviews.text: After 2 days of being plugged in, I no longer hear the critters through the walls. I am beyond satisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Happy84

customer_reviews.title: I put each room mouse not scare I bought from ...
customer_reviews.text: I put each room mouse not scare I bought from Home Depot and from Amazon How long will mouse gone Mouse still run around every night
customer_reviews.author: khonnak m.

customer_reviews.title: Do they do anything?
customer_reviews.text: I have all 3 in my garage. Still have mice in the garage. Not sure if they do anything at all.
customer_reviews.author: thomas fox

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: The nightlights on all 3 stopped working less than 6 months after I started using them. I called the company and was told that if the nightlights are out then the product isn't working. They advertise that these will last for 3-5 years. Did the product work when the nightlights were working? I don't know because I was still trapping mice in the traps that were nearby!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Brock

customer_reviews.title: Worthless Investment
customer_reviews.text: These don't work - don't waste your money! I bought 2 units of 3 for my home, and I'm pretty sure the mice think I've provided them with a surround sound concert; they are totally unphased. I wanted a humane way to get rid of the mice; this definitely is not it. The nightlights aren't effective either except to show you were the unit is plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: DollyD

customer_reviews.title: Not safe for cats
customer_reviews.text: There are mice above my ceiling. These are not good for cats. I plugged them in, and immediately, my cat's eyes got large and it acted weird, looking around. Then it started sneezing uncontrollably. It laid next to me and started shaking. As soon as I unplugged them, it stopped sneezing and was able to fall asleep. Cats CAN hear them. Cats can hear up to 64hz.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mice away
customer_reviews.text: Decent product. Rarely see anything anymore only thing is it messes with the frequency of your belongings like microwave toaster etc my advice is keep them low level but overall nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Johnson

customer_reviews.title: THEY. DO. NOT. WORK.
customer_reviews.text: They don’t work. I use them as nightlights. I found mouse poop literally underneath it. Had to call an exterminator
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: First thing I loved about these is how easy the package is to open. This is very easy to open and then just plug them in and they are good to go!
customer_reviews.author: ALISON VONIDERSTINE

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: A waste of money! Didn't help with anything actually became night lights....
customer_reviews.author: Conswala

customer_reviews.title: I was hopefull but seems to not stand up to it’s pur
customer_reviews.text: I hoped this would help get rid of or deter the mouse in our house but he would come out walk by it and around it and not even seem to be bothered by it.
customer_reviews.author: Avner L.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It’s been 3 months of cold weather and no mice that I can see !
customer_reviews.author: Pam P

customer_reviews.title: No mice. NO MORE.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I put 2 in each room. I haven't seen a trace since.
customer_reviews.author: TZ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to use and worth the value. Fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY AGUILAR

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: These are working pretty good. I got enough to keep them out of all but one room and the one room is trapped well. I’ve mostly gotten rid of my mouse problem
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Nope, just don’t spend your money on this. The mice will still come. I just caught one next to 2 of this ultrasonic Victors!!!
customer_reviews.author: Florencia Arro

customer_reviews.title: Not for squirrels
customer_reviews.text: Well this doesn't work for squirrels. Not sure yet if it does for mice. Will update again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gray

customer_reviews.title: These work
customer_reviews.text: They work well but need to be replaced every few months but that's ok because they are a good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: emily tope

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: So far have no problems. Don't kow what people are talking about these being a fire hazard. Mine are plugged in 24hrs a day with no problem. FYI Dogs can hear these and they are quite painful to them, at least to my lab.
customer_reviews.author: David Hinchliffe

customer_reviews.title: Noise
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it works. Emits an annoying noise for humans too.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: These always work for us and the night light is a nice feature
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price with great service and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hinck

customer_reviews.title: Love the nightlights that is on the units
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working, haven't seen evidence of mice in our basement since we plugged these in. Love the nightlights that is on the units.
customer_reviews.author: B. K.

customer_reviews.title: Good for ants too.
customer_reviews.text: So far, these have worked great for ants actually. We haven't seen any critters at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cali

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely hopeless!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely hopeless. I would love to return this, as kept it for over 3 weeks as people suggested, and then too late to return. It did absolutely nothing! Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sally J Rowberry

customer_reviews.title: Mouse found dead
customer_reviews.text: So I put one in right above my garbage cart inside my garage. Imagine my surprise, dismay, disappointment, and disgust when not 6 inches away, on top of the garbage cart, was a very dead, and already decaying mouse. Guess these do not work in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Chris V.

customer_reviews.title: Noise or exclusion of visitors
customer_reviews.text: No visitors since I plugged these in, I see why the noise is awful!! Yes you can hear these, I still decided to keep them because it ran the visitors back out of the hole they crawled into! Of course I went around the foundation and sealed up any holes. I know that these are surely keeping them from digging there way back into my home. You will eventually get use to the noise. Sometimes I hear it sometimes I don't! Night light is bright! So far they are all still functioning , I think the product says they should last for three years.
customer_reviews.author: Haskins

customer_reviews.title: Useless for NYC mice
customer_reviews.text: This is useless for NYC mice. I saw the mice walked under the device like nothing happen.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan L

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camper.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe it seems to drive them away! Happy Camper.
customer_reviews.author: earthman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We use these in our camp. Seem to work well repelling mice.
customer_reviews.author: BJB

customer_reviews.title: I don't think this works
customer_reviews.text: I don't think it made a difference. I filmed a big rat on my grape vine after the installation, just 10 feet away from the device.
customer_reviews.author: Augusto Lages

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! We had one mouse that we caught in a glue trap. I bought these and haven't seen any since.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pesci

customer_reviews.title: ... Seen or heard any mice in our attic I love It because it doesn’t harm them simply just runs ...
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I put These out I havent Seen or heard any mice in our attic I love It because it doesn’t harm them simply just runs them away

customer_reviews.title: Don't work. my house is very clean but I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't work. my house is very clean but I'm finding mouse droppings! I have one in each outlet, they don't work!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamesha Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Used it and mice still around. What finally worked for me are glue traps
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Repellers work perfectly, we have not had any sightings of rodents since we plugged them in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Liked: Compact and less expensive than other similar products. Dislike: They didn’t work! I could hear mice at night in rooms where this product was plugged in. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: AbC

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery, as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Like the night light. Been using these for years in our out buildings. Never had rodents where we have them

customer_reviews.title: Product Sucks
customer_reviews.text: This did nothing for our mice problem. Complete waste of money!

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't think these work. I can still hear the critters!

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The mice still eat my dog's food which is a few feet from this unit.

customer_reviews.title: Hopefull A Great Solution
customer_reviews.text: So far I have not seen any rodents in my garage since using these.

customer_reviews.text: These worked well for our rodent issues and provided a clean, no-clean up needed method for pest repellant.

customer_reviews.title: They are small and life span is only 3 years.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike, I have them in every plugin in the Machine shed and so far, ( knock on wood) no rodent damage, at all. On top off that? Bugs are at a low as well.

customer_reviews.title: Didnt get correct pack they,have multiple selections they did not catch at the distribution center.
customer_reviews.text: Description and photo showed 2 nightlights. Package arrived with one nightlight and 2 unlit units. Kinda annoying Overall, does what it's designed to do.

customer_reviews.title: Rodent alarm
customer_reviews.text: Even when I had these in my garage I was still getting mice in my traps. This product does not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: They work! (For us anyway)
customer_reviews.text: I like these because they work! The nightlight is a nice bonus
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: I can hear some of the frequencies, and got ...
customer_reviews.text: I can hear some of the frequencies, and got a headache an hour after plugging them in around the house. Apparently ultrasound is not ideal for me.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gioja

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work, but great nightlights.
customer_reviews.text: They do not work at all. If you want to repel pests look elsewhere. However, I like the design as a nightlight.
customer_reviews.author: TV

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It only worked for about a month. I believe they got used to the sound.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We have not had any more mice in our garage!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I can hear a low buzzing but nothing I can't handle or ignore

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three packs of these and placed one in every room in my house. They are great as an expensive night light but last night I awakened in time enough to watch a mouse run past the plugged in unit!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Bought one of these devices and used while at winter ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these devices and used while at winter home. When we returned see no sign of critters where we installed.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this product but the mice are gone!

customer_reviews.text: I like that these plug-ins both deter rodents and act as a night light.

customer_reviews.text: Seem to work well. I have not seen any mice since I started using these

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Have had them in our Toy Hauler for one week and so far no mice.

product_meta.title: Victor Mini M752SN Ultrasonic Rodent Repeller with Nightlight, 2-Pack (Not available in HI, NM, PR)
product_meta.description: Size:2-PackVictor Mini pestchaser is equipped with a new nightlight feature that provides a soft glow in the dark. The unit's mini size & discreet design make it ideal for living areas. This highly-effective mini pestchaser produces high frequency ultrasound that repels rodents away. The ultrasound, with over 80 oscillation S, emitted at varying volumes & varying frequencies keep rodents from adapting to the sound. The sound cannot by heard by humans or non-rodent pets such as cats, dogs, Birds & fish. Most users experience a reduction in rodent activity in as little as 6 to 10 days.
